CustomField.description: Used for Conga Templates. Translates the scope field to Grantee languages.
CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(FundingAward.Awardee.Language_Preference__c) = "French", CASE(Type,"Grant Agreement", "Accord de Subvention","Final Financial","Rapport Financière Final","Final Narrative","Rapport Narratif Final","Interim Financial","Rapport Financière Intermediaire","Interim Narrative","Rapport Narratif Intermediaire",""),
IF(TEXT(FundingAward.Awardee.Language_Preference__c) = "Kreyol", CASE(Type,"Grant Agreement", "Akò Sibvansyon","Final Financial","Rapò Finansye Final","Final Narrative","Rapò Naratif Final","Interim Financial","Rapò Finansye Enterimè","Interim Narrative","Rapò Naratif Enterimè",""),
IF(TEXT(FundingAward.Awardee.Language_Preference__c) = "Spanish", CASE(Type,"Grant Agreement", "Acuerdo de Subvención","Final Financial","Informe Financiero Final","Final Narrative","Informe Narrativo Final","Interim Financial","Informe Financiero Intermedio","Interim Narrative","Informe Narrativo Intermedio",""),
"")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for Conga Templates. Translates the scope field to Grantee languages.
CustomField.label: Scope Translated
